title: Should we give Salam to each person in a room or giving it once to all is sufficient Assim al hakeem
transcript: I would highly recommend that you don't do this Jonnie giving Salam shaking hands to all 10 it's ok but saying Salam repeating it is not from the Sun it's sufficient for you to come in the room and say as Salam aleikum wa rahmatullah and shake hands with everyone else you just simply see how you're doing good morning how are things what's up that's that's ok but repeating Salam alaikum Salam aleikum Salam aleikum this is not something that is recommended that Allah soldier knows best
